title: Hiking Boot
description: A style of boot commonly worn on long walks or for hiking. Generally distinct from other footwear-related emojis by the considerable grip on the sole of the shoe.
apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s hiking boot emoji is designed with rugged realism, featuring soft rounded edges and detailed stitching that speaks to its durability and adventurous spirit. The boot is rendered with subtle shading and highlights, giving it a tangible, three-dimensional presence on Apple devices. This emoji signifies outdoor exploration, travel, and a readiness for physical activity, often used to express a love for nature or plans for a trek.
